author: jason.carver
content: Oh the other thing is: you're less likely to fall behind the tip with that "Import starved" message if you have some more peers. I'm guessing you're capping it to only connect to the one peer <@!482518216019542016> ? Maybe open it up to 5.

author: guilhermesalgado9479
content: <@!489256758989029405> your node is no longer reachable. is it still running?

author: guilhermesalgado9479
content: also, can you point me to which branch (if any) I should use to run a nethermind/wit node?
